wikipedia_page.main: Abigail "Aby" King (born 1 March 1977) is a British novelist best known as the author of the Adventures of a Royal Dog fantasy series. The first book in the series, Lupo & The Secret of Windsor Castle, was released on 4 September 2014, published by Hodder Children's Books. There are currently four books planned within the series, which is based on The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge's cocker spaniel, Lupo.
